oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring 1) Charles Robertson, “Wholesale Baker, Confectioner and Candy Manufacturer, Fruits, Nuts, Pickles, Preserves and Fancy Goods, No. 24 North Market Street, Branch House 112 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee;” 2) R.L. Weakley, “Wholesale Grocer and Commission Merchant, and Dealer in Bacon, Lard and Produce Generally, No. 6 North College Street;” 3) Daniel Dougheny, “Wholesale Grocer and Liquor Dealer, Rectifier and Compounder of Liquors, No. 63 Broad Street; 4) Kircher & Ateiner, “Dealers in Clothing and Gent’s Furnishing Goods, Nos. 51 & 53 South Market St. ... Jas.E. Patterson, Salesman.” Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kircher & Ateiner (Nashville, Tenn.)
